title: Drawing Journey of FraYoshi
description:
I started a journey to increase my drawing skill, this is a place where a share some steps I'm taking ^^

---

Media on this blog travel via [IPFS](https://ipfs.io). I suggest the installation of [IPFS companion](https://github.com/ipfs-shipyard/ipfs-companion) to accelerate them ^^

---

Telegram: [FraYoshiFeed](https://t.me/FraYoshiFeed)

clearnet: [fgobbo.com](http://fgobbo.com)

[8 Bits Away Blog](/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN)

post.title: Learning manga girl eyes
post.body:
I followed [Learn2DrawManga's tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zdjgsuqt2O0), this my result at the end of the lesson :3
![IPFS manga girl eyes.png](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmckCNFhTw44batX4zHXZQyqPPhaM7YXnafy9HEYms6Sei)

post.title: Winry Rockbell paint attempt
post.body:
Yes, well...
I can summarize that one of the things I need to focus a little bit more are the eyes XD
![IPFS winry-rockbell-attempt.png](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmZNL2GwPa6jFQNx3VKV6NYHis9dVJSUS7MvqfBhbefBC9)
in the paint I tried to reproduce Winry Rockbell from Full Metal Alchemist, well.. tried XD

post.title: Sad pre-Valentine sketch
post.body:
It was a sad pre-valentine night.. when I started sketching on my drawing tablet and this came out... obviously was not a good night, I noticed the thing just a couple pencil lines later...

![IPFS sad pre-valentine.png](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWWMf57ai3q1vefxBju6T6468eMADbqPucAfMorJ4BtW5)

post.title: Sketching on the waiting room
post.body:
I've been taught that drawing requires practice, so I started sketching what I was seeing on a waiting room :)
legs were my first start, then I've been called on the phone and I continued drawing the table switching to my left hand ^^

I then realized that starting to draw I should probably train my left hand together with my right one ^^

did u ever?
which hand do u use?
is it the same main one that you use for all the rest? :3
![IPFS sketch-left-right-legs-table.jpg](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmenSKgkY3WeSCQkJGmAk7K86eS7Q7WgAjotii6vRPrpaS)

post.title: My first steps into drawing
post.body:
It has been a while since when I tried to start learning to draw.. but Today I effectively started! ^-^

![IPFS 1st-face-sketch.png](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmV8be2tTqkSv3fP1MgXNoEprsUBfdpndwUeWBLkog5dfc)

This my first face sketch :)

![IPFS body-drawing-notes.png](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSycXncijHf4xy1UzBaq9dKXLMZtrwi2di7MRYsvh9jkt)

For my start I followed [Love Life Drawing](https://www.lovelifedrawing.com)'s advices ^^

And I sketched the face following [Sophie Chan's video](https://youtu.be/4NABndKnAzo) :3
